name: Lines of Defense
description:
You play as an king trying to defend his own castle, you can put on canons or wizard to defend yourself as you the player gets attacked by Archers and Knights from another kingdom.

(This game is made for an school project, so I hope you like it :D)

(I also published it on GameJolt, so if you want to check it out, here is the link)

Link: https://gamejolt.com/games/LinesOfDefense/654502

if you want to check out the code of my game, here is the link of my github:

https://github.com/WarlockGames12/TowerDefend
